last_episode_to_air.name: Legal Right Share
last_episode_to_air.overview: The miracle has upset everyone's destinies, including secrets surfaced from the past and future choices. But there is time for a final twist.

name: The Miracle
overview: In Rome, a Virgin Mary statue is found crying blood. Pondering on the implications of the existence of miracles, and eventually, the existence of God, the people involved in the enigma start losing their minds.

episodes.name: The Conservation of Matter
episodes.overview: During a strike on a mob hideout, officers find a Virgin Mary sculpture which weeps blood, and this miraculous occurrence impacts the lives of the country's politicians and religious leaders forever.

episodes.name: Lazarus Aside
episodes.overview: While investigations are continuing, the Premier goes to the place of the miracle together with a priest friend, Father Marcello.

episodes.name: The First Duty of the Living
episodes.overview: Sandra sends blood to a Phoenix lab to clear the mystery. Meanwhile, strange dreams undermine the skepticism of the Premier.

episodes.name: The Black Substance
episodes.overview: While the images of Sun's irascibility become viral, Sandra obtains valuable information on the origin of the blood.

episodes.name: The Pilot Flame
episodes.overview: While the Premier is afraid of losing political consensus, the investigations seem to finally reach a turning point.

episodes.name: The Princess of Swimming Pools
episodes.overview: Sandra flies to Belgium in the footsteps of Amin Tarek. Sole hopes to repair image damage with an interview.

episodes.name: Mea Culpa
episodes.overview: A shocking truth emerges from the past of Father Marcello. Meanwhile, the Amin blood test produces an unsettling outcome.

episodes.name: Legal Right Share
episodes.overview: The miracle has upset everyone's destinies, including secrets surfaced from the past and future choices. But there is time for a final twist.
